short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Deletes cookies, storage and service workers for the current tab's domain and subdomains and refreshes the page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you clear out the cookies, storage and service workers of the website you're currently on. Does not work on google domains.
